content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Mr. Wang. I'm glad you're interested in renting my apartment. Let's discuss the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I know that you want a fair price for your apartment, but I am a student and I am looking for a low-priced apartment. Therefore, I propose a price of 300 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Mr. Wang, but I believe the apartment's prime location and amenities warrant a higher price. I am willing to negotiate, but 300 Euro per month is too low for this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable. I revise my offer to 400 Euro per month. This is a reasonable price for an apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While 400 Euro per month is more reasonable, I believe the apartment's value is closer to 500 Euro per month. It's a beautiful, newly built apartment in the heart of the city.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. However, as a student, I have a limited budget. I propose a price of 450 Euro per month. This is a fair price for both parties.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: While 450 Euro per month is closer to my expectations, I believe the apartment's value is still higher. I am willing to negotiate, but I am looking for a price closer to 500 Euro per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I appreciate your persistence. I propose a price of 475 Euro per month. This is the highest price I can offer as a student.
[A:master]
[A]I appreciate your understanding. I accept your offer of 475 Euro per month. I agree to the price of [475] Euro!
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: [A]I appreciate your understanding. I accept your offer of 475 Euro per month. I agree to the price of [475] Euro!
